about_the_game:
For thousands of years, countless travelers have gone to the deep mountains in search of the legendary paradise.
They either linger, or resign and never find their way, or die from illness.
The two girls run away from home together and embark on a journey to find the Peach Blossom Spring.
Is the most beautiful Peach Blossom Spring an ideal holy place that can keep them away from chaos, or is it another form of hell?
What kind of mysteries are buried in them?

DLC content description:

"Lay a Beauty to Rest: A Butterfly Dream" is a story about the young lady "Yueqiu Yan" who died at the beginning of this chapter.
In the first half of the DLC, the plot will be unfolded from the perspective of Yan Yueqiu, presenting the cause and effect of Yueqiu and Qing He coming to Peach Blossom Spring.
In the second half of the DLC, we will return to the perspective of the protagonist "Ji Ming". Ji Ming will come to Peach Blossom Spring three days in advance, and the world line will change! (The detective finally has the hope of getting the full amount of the commission!)
100,000 words of text. (no repeating text this time lol)
80 new CG (including difference) 7 new soundtracks. (composed by Candy_wind)
Full voice dubbing. (It's basically the voice actors of the funeral flower.)

In order for most players to have a good experience, I hope that those who have played the DLC plot will not spoil the DLC and the comment area of ​​this article.
I hope you all enjoy the plot and characters of "A Butterfly Dream"!

Welcome to our Discord Channel https://discord.gg/PQNjkKTa7h
